I am April, a

I am a web technologies student at Kirkwood Community College in Cedar Rapids, Iowa. I am the marketing director at a local dance studio and a digital content manager for a marketing agency.

I specialize in

Building user-friendly websites that show a brand's mission, value, and offerings
